verses.text: Now \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w Ashbel|strong="H0788"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, and \w Aharah|strong="H0315"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*,
\w Nohah|strong="H5119"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*, and \w Rapha|strong="H7498"\w* the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* were, \w Addar|strong="H0146"\w*, and \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*, and \w Abihud|strong="H0031"\w*,\f + \fr 8.3 \ft Addar: or, Ard\f*
And \w Abishua|strong="H0050"\w*, and \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*, and \w Ahoah|strong="H0265"\w*,
And \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*, and \w Shephuphan|strong="H8197"\w*, and \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w*.\f + \fr 8.5 \ft Shephuphan: or, Shupham\f*

And these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ehud|strong="H0261"\w*: these are the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w*, and they \w removed|strong="H1540"\w* them to \w Manahath|strong="H4506"\w*:

And \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*, and \w Ahiah|strong="H0281"\w*, and \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*, he \w removed|strong="H1540"\w* them, and \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w*, and \w Ahihud|strong="H0284"\w*.

And \w Shaharaim|strong="H7842"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \add children\add* in the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w after|strong="H4480"\w* he had sent them \w away|strong="H7971"\w*; \w Hushim|strong="H2366"\w* and \w Baara|strong="H1199"\w* \add were\add* his \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*.

And he \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* of \w Hodesh|strong="H2321"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w*, and \w Zibia|strong="H6644"\w*, and \w Mesha|strong="H4331"\w*, and \w Malcham|strong="H4445"\w*,

And \w Jeuz|strong="H3263"\w*, and \w Shachia|strong="H7634"\w*, and \w Mirma|strong="H4821"\w*. These \add were\add* his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.
And of \w Hushim|strong="H2366"\w* he \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Abitub|strong="H0036"\w*, and \w Elpaal|strong="H0508"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elpaal|strong="H0508"\w*; \w Eber|strong="H5677"\w*, and \w Misham|strong="H4936"\w*, and \w Shamed|strong="H8106"\w*, who \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Ono|strong="H0207"\w*, and \w Lod|strong="H3850"\w*, with the \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* thereof:

\w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w* also, and \w Shema|strong="H8087"\w*, \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \add were\add* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Aijalon|strong="H0357"\w*, who drove \w away|strong="H1272"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*:
And \w Ahio|strong="H0283"\w*, \w Shashak|strong="H8349"\w*, and \w Jeremoth|strong="H3406"\w*,
And \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w*, and \w Arad|strong="H6166"\w*, and \w Ader|strong="H5738"\w*,
And \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*, and \w Ispah|strong="H3472"\w*, and \w Joha|strong="H3109"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w*;
And \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w*, and \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, and \w Hezeki|strong="H2395"\w*, and \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w*,
\w Ishmerai|strong="H3461"\w* also, and \w Jezliah|strong="H3152"\w*, and \w Jobab|strong="H3103"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elpaal|strong="H0508"\w*;
And \w Jakim|strong="H3356"\w*, and \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*, and \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*,
And \w Elienai|strong="H0462"\w*, and \w Zilthai|strong="H6769"\w*, and \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*,

And \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w*, and \w Beraiah|strong="H1256"\w*, and \w Shimrath|strong="H8119"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimhi|strong="H8096"\w*;\f + \fr 8.21 \ft Shimhi: or, Shema\f*
And \w Ishpan|strong="H3473"\w*, and \w Heber|strong="H5677"\w*, and \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*,
And \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w*, and \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*, and \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w*,
And \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, and \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, and \w Antothijah|strong="H6070"\w*,
And \w Iphedeiah|strong="H3301"\w*, and \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shashak|strong="H8349"\w*;
And \w Shamsherai|strong="H8125"\w*, and \w Shehariah|strong="H7841"\w*, and \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*,
And \w Jaresiah|strong="H3298"\w*, and \w Eliah|strong="H0452"\w*, and \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*.

These \add were\add* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, by their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*, \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \add men\add*. These \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And at \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* of \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w*; whose \w wife’s|strong="H0802"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w*:\f + \fr 8.29 \ft father…: also called Jehiel\f*

And his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abdon|strong="H5658"\w*, and \w Zur|strong="H6698"\w*, and \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*, and \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*,
And \w Gedor|strong="H1446"\w*, and \w Ahio|strong="H0283"\w*, and \w Zacher|strong="H2144"\w*.\f + \fr 8.31 \ft Zacher: or, Zechariah\f*

And \w Mikloth|strong="H4732"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Shimeah|strong="H8039"\w*. And these \w also|strong="H0637"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* with their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, over against \w them|strong="H5048"\w*.\f + \fr 8.32 \ft Shimeah: or, Shimeam\f*

¶ And \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*, and \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, and \w Malchi-shua|strong="H4444"\w*, and \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*, and \w Esh-baal|strong="H0792"\w*.\f + \fr 8.33 \ft Abinadab: also called, Ishui\f*\f + \fr 8.33 \ft Esh-baal: or, Ish-bosheth\f*

And the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \add was\add* \w Merib-baal|strong="H4807"\w*; and \w Merib-baal|strong="H4807"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w*.\f + \fr 8.34 \ft Merib-baal: or, Mephibosheth\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Micah|strong="H4318"\w* \add were\add*, \w Pithon|strong="H6377"\w*, and \w Melech|strong="H4429"\w*, and \w Tarea|strong="H8390"\w*, and \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*.\f + \fr 8.35 \ft Tarea: or, Tahrea\f*

And \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Jehoadah|strong="H3085"\w*; and \w Jehoadah|strong="H3085"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Alemeth|strong="H5964"\w*, and \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*, and \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w*; and \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Moza|strong="H4162"\w*,\f + \fr 8.36 \ft Jehoadah: also called, Jarah\f*

And \w Moza|strong="H4162"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Binea|strong="H1150"\w*: \w Rapha|strong="H7498"\w* \add was\add* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Eleasah|strong="H0501"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Azel|strong="H0682"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*:\f + \fr 8.37 \ft Rapha: also called, Rephaiah\f*

And \w Azel|strong="H0682"\w* had \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \add are\add* these, \w Azrikam|strong="H5840"\w*, \w Bocheru|strong="H1074"\w*, and \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, and \w Sheariah|strong="H8187"\w*, and \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, and \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w*. All these \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azel|strong="H0682"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eshek|strong="H6232"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \add were\add*, \w Ulam|strong="H0198"\w* his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, \w Jehush|strong="H3266"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, and \w Eliphelet|strong="H0467"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ulam|strong="H0198"\w* were \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, \w archers|strong="H1869"\w*, and had \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*. All these \add are\add* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.
